name: esihandler
description: [Edge Side Includes (ESI)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edge_Side_Includes) is used for dynamically assembling HTML contents on the Edge (i.e. CDN). When a HTML page is requested, an ESI processor running on the Edge intercepts and looks for tags (e.g. `<esi:include src='http://some.com/page' />`, fetches the content from the `src`, then replace the ESI tag with the content.
